overview: Geetha Murali, Director of Product Marketing at Koollage, has previously held positions with GlaxoSmithKline and Chiron. She has also worked with educational technology programs like the Digital Equalizer Program of the American India Foundation and Adobe Youth Voices of Adobe Systems Inc. Murali has a M.S. from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and an M.A. and Ph.D. from the University of California at Berkeley.
